item.content:encoded:
Technical Details

Brand ‚ÄéMyhaptim
Color ‚ÄéWhite
Material ‚Äé‚ÄéAluminum, Glass
Style ‚Äé‚ÄéClassic,Retro
Light fixture form ‚ÄéSconce
Room Type ‚ÄéPatio, garage, balcony, decks, porches, doorways, gardens, hallways, entryways
Indoor/Outdoor Usage ‚ÄéOutdoor
Power Source ‚ÄéAC
Product Dimensions ‚Äé8.85″L x 5.9″W x 11.8″H
Special Feature ‚Äé‚ÄéWaterproof, Dusk to Dawn, Water Resistant, 2 Built-in GFCI Outlets, Motion Sensor
Control Method ‚ÄéRemote
Light Source Type ‚Äé‚ÄéLED, Incandescent
Finish Type ‚ÄéPolished
Shade Material ‚ÄéGlass
Voltage ‚Äé125 Volts
Included Components ‚ÄéBulb
Item Weight ‚Äé4.4 Pounds
Item Package Quantity ‚Äé1
Manufacturer ‚ÄéMyhaptim
Part Number ‚Äé3215-1
Item Weight ‚Äé4.4 pounds
Product Dimensions ‚Äé8.85 x 5.9 x 11.8 inches
Country of Origin ‚ÄéChina
Item model number ‚Äé3215
Assembled Height ‚Äé11.8 inches
Assembled Length ‚Äé8.85 inches
Assembled Width ‚Äé5.9 inches
Finish Types ‚ÄéPolished
Special Features ‚Äé‚ÄéWaterproof, Dusk to Dawn, Water Resistant, 2 Built-in GFCI Outlets, Motion Sensor
Shade Color ‚ÄéWhite
Switch Style ‚ÄéPush Button
Switch Installation Type ‚ÄéWall Mount
Batteries Required? ‚ÄéNo

Additional Information

ASIN B0BHMWXW4J
Best Sellers Rank #42,090 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)
#198 in Patio Wall Light Fixture
Date First Available October 8, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $69.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:26:27 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Myhaptim Outdoor Wall Sconce Fixture with GFCI Outlet

Our porch light motion sensor with GFCI Outlet, a combination of vintage and modern design, is perfect for most outdoor settings such as garages, porches, front doors, gardens, balconies, patios, entrances, driveways, patios, foyers, etc.

When the dusk to dawn motion sensor (enters test mode, in this mode can also be sensed during the day), the light will turn off after 5 seconds. When motion sensing is turned on again after 2 minutes (automatically in normal working mode, in which it can only be sensed at night), the light will turn off after 2 minutes. Each time it is sensed, it is in normal working mode.Unlike other outdoor lights on the market, this light has a downward GFCI outlet design that protects the outlet from rain.This front porch light has been designed to the best degree of sensing sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time after sensing.

Suitable for any dimmable E26 bulb

It maybe malfunctioned or flicker with Non-dimmable bulb.Bulbs are not included in the product

Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights with 2 GFCI Outlet

Specification

Voltage: 110-125v

Color:White

Power Source: Corded-Electric

14.5 AWG Input Wire

Max Load : 1080w

Installation Type: Hardwired/Wall Mount

Sensing Range: Distance 33FT, Angle 270¬∞

Material: Aluminum & Tempered Glass

Color: Matte Black & Hand-painting Golden Edge

Base Type: E26 Base, 100W Max.

3 Upgraded Motion Sensor Lighting Modes

Just turn the wall switch ‚Äúon-off-on‚Äù within 0.5~2sec. to shift to manual mode, keeping 100% brightness at night for 8 hours, but will auto turn off at dawn.

Saving electricity for you, it won‚Äôt turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection.

These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected. (It is the high mode when it arrives)

Easy access to any outdoor activity when you need power

About GFCI Outlet

Simply turn on the light and plug in your security cameras, party party d√©cor, power tools, garden tools, etc.

Plugged the device into the GFCI outlet, if the device is not powered, please check the following steps:

1) Please check whether the device is plugged into the GFCI outlet tightly.

2) If the device is connected to the GFCI outlet correctly but still does not work:

A. Check whether the TEST button pops up and the Red LED indicator is always on. If so, it indicates that the connected device is short-circuited, please unplug the device and correct the circuit fault.

B. After troubleshooting, press the TEST button first, then press the RESET button, and then plug the device, if the Green LED indicator flashes, it indicates that the GFCI outlet is working properly; if the TEST button pop up once again and the Red LED indicator is on again, it indicates that the device short circuit fault is not eliminated successfully, please repeat steps A to B.

Weather Resistance & Durability

In addition to the rust-resistant aluminum and water-resistant matter black coating, this exterior house light has passed salt spray testing and multiple weather conditions such as heavy rain, snowstorms, hurricanes and hot sun to protect the light body. The sturdy aluminum material and tempered glass ensure that it will not rust or corrode for years

Dusk to Dawn Motion Sensor

Upgrade the dusk to dawn motion sensor, through infrared induction, when the detection of motion will light up, no detection when closed, to save you power.

GFCI Outlet

Built-in 2 GFCI OUTLET for your outdoor power supply with added protection against surges, short circuits and other electrical faults

„Äê3 LIGHT MODES„Äë: The upgraded outdoor lights are built-in dusk to dawn motion sensor and bringing 3 working modes. (Manual / Low / High)‚ë†Manual mode: just turn the wall-mounted switch “on-off-on” within 0.5~2 secondso shift to manual mode,keeping 100% brightness for 8 hours at night ,the dusk-to-dawn sensor detects morning and will automatically turn off. (Note: light switch in ON position, Sensing distance: 33FT, Sensing angle: 270¬∞),‚ë°Low Mode: Saving electricity for you, it won‚Äôt turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection. ‚ë¢High Mode: These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected
„ÄêCLASSIC STYLE & MULTIPLE-SCENE„Äë: Vintage rustic design that adds sophistication to any outdoor decor, this outside lights the aluminum finish pairs perfectly with most outdoor occasions, such as patio,garages,balcony,front porches,doorways,gardens,hallways
„ÄêWEATHER RESISTANT & STURDY MATERIAL„Äë: White dusk to dawn motion sensor front porch lights , using rust-proof metal frame and thickened reinforced tempered water glass as a lampshade, lamp bezel coating waterproof golden quality aluminum, can waterproof, corrosion-resistant, anti-rust, can effectively resist heavy rain, snow, ice, high temperature and other weather, in these weather conditions, can be used for a longer period of time than the light fixtures on the market and don’t worry about the quality of the problem.
„ÄêRECOMMENDED BULB & E26 BASE„Äë: Our outdoor wall sconce does not include a bulb and uses a UL listed E26 base for long life, compatible with any kind of standard E26 LED bulb/incandescent bulb (Max 60W), the open design of the bottom of this fixture makes it easy for you to install the bulb or clean the fixture without disassembly, for a better experience, it is recommended to choose a dimmable incandescent or LED bulb, otherwise it will malfunction or flicker
„ÄêEASY INSTALLATION„Äë: The package of the porch light comes with installation instructions and mounting hardware, just finish the installation on the wall, remember to press the “Reset” or “Test” button between the GFCI sockets to reset the sockets and test the use, otherwise the light will probably not turn on, there will be no power output on the sockets, induction Sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time are not adjustable, please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about this outdoor light.
„ÄêIMPORTANT NOTE„ÄëWhen the motion sensing is on for the first time (Enter Test Mode, it can also be sensed during the day in this mode), the light will be turned off after 5 seconds. When the motion sensing is on again after 2 minutes (Automatically Enter Normal Working Mode, it only can be sensed on the night in this mode), the light will be turned off after 2 minutes. After that, every time it is sensed, it is Normal Working Mode.If you are not familiar with electrical knowledge, please contact an electrician to install
„Äê3-Year Warranty„ÄëWe provide 3 years warranty and replacement or refund within 30 days; Although we trust the premium design and high-end quality of our product, if you are not satisfied, you can ask for a full refund with no additional questions asked. If you have any questions about our products, please log in to your account, check the order ID and click “Contact Seller” to contact us;Our customer service will solve your problem within 24 hours

Myhaptim Outdoor Wall Sconce Fixture with GFCI Outlet

Our porch light motion sensor with GFCI Outlet, a combination of vintage and modern design, is perfect for most outdoor settings such as garages, porches, front doors, gardens, balconies, patios, entrances, driveways, patios, foyers, etc.

  • When the dusk to dawn motion sensor (enters test mode, in this mode can also be sensed during the day), the light will turn off after 5 seconds. When motion sensing is turned on again after 2 minutes (automatically in normal working mode, in which it can only be sensed at night), the light will turn off after 2 minutes. Each time it is sensed, it is in normal working mode.
  • Unlike other outdoor lights on the market, this light has a downward GFCI outlet design that protects the outlet from rain.This front porch light has been designed to the best degree of sensing sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time after sensing.

Suitable for any dimmable E26 bulb

It maybe malfunctioned or flicker with Non-dimmable bulb.Bulbs are not included in the product

2) If the device is connected to the GFCI outlet correctly but still does not work:

A. Check whether the TEST button pops up and the Red LED indicator is always on. If so, it indicates that the connected device is short-circuited, please unplug the device and correct the circuit fault.

B. After troubleshooting, press the TEST button first, then press the RESET button, and then plug the device, if the Green LED indicator flashes, it indicates that the GFCI outlet is working properly; if the TEST button pop up once again and the Red LED indicator is on again, it indicates that the device short circuit fault is not eliminated successfully, please repeat steps A to B.

In addition to the rust-resistant aluminum and water-resistant matter black coating, this exterior house light has passed salt spray testing and multiple weather conditions such as heavy rain, snowstorms, hurricanes and hot sun to protect the light body. The sturdy aluminum material and tempered glass ensure that it will not rust or corrode for years

Built-in 2 GFCI OUTLET for your outdoor power supply with added protection against surges, short circuits and other electrical faults

Myhaptim Outdoor Wall Sconce Fixture with GFCI Outlet

Our porch light motion sensor with GFCI Outlet, a combination of vintage and modern design, is perfect for most outdoor settings such as garages, porches, front doors, gardens, balconies, patios, entrances, driveways, patios, foyers, etc.

When the dusk to dawn motion sensor (enters test mode, in this mode can also be sensed during the day), the light will turn off after 5 seconds. When motion sensing is turned on again after 2 minutes (automatically in normal working mode, in which it can only be sensed at night), the light will turn off after 2 minutes. Each time it is sensed, it is in normal working mode.Unlike other outdoor lights on the market, this light has a downward GFCI outlet design that protects the outlet from rain.This front porch light has been designed to the best degree of sensing sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time after sensing.

Suitable for any dimmable E26 bulb

It maybe malfunctioned or flicker with Non-dimmable bulb.Bulbs are not included in the product

Just turn the wall switch ‚Äúon-off-on‚Äù within 0.5~2sec. to shift to manual mode, keeping 100% brightness at night for 8 hours, but will auto turn off at dawn.

Saving electricity for you, it won‚Äôt turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection.

These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected. (It is the high mode when it arrives)

Easy access to any outdoor activity when you need power

About GFCI Outlet

Simply turn on the light and plug in your security cameras, party party d√©cor, power tools, garden tools, etc.

Plugged the device into the GFCI outlet, if the device is not powered, please check the following steps:

1) Please check whether the device is plugged into the GFCI outlet tightly.

2) If the device is connected to the GFCI outlet correctly but still does not work:

A. Check whether the TEST button pops up and the Red LED indicator is always on. If so, it indicates that the connected device is short-circuited, please unplug the device and correct the circuit fault.

B. After troubleshooting, press the TEST button first, then press the RESET button, and then plug the device, if the Green LED indicator flashes, it indicates that the GFCI outlet is working properly; if the TEST button pop up once again and the Red LED indicator is on again, it indicates that the device short circuit fault is not eliminated successfully, please repeat steps A to B.

Weather Resistance & Durability

In addition to the rust-resistant aluminum and water-resistant matter black coating, this exterior house light has passed salt spray testing and multiple weather conditions such as heavy rain, snowstorms, hurricanes and hot sun to protect the light body. The sturdy aluminum material and tempered glass ensure that it will not rust or corrode for years

Dusk to Dawn Motion Sensor

Upgrade the dusk to dawn motion sensor, through infrared induction, when the detection of motion will light up, no detection when closed, to save you power.

GFCI Outlet

Built-in 2 GFCI OUTLET for your outdoor power supply with added protection against surges, short circuits and other electrical faults

„Äê3 LIGHT MODES„Äë: The upgraded outdoor lights are built-in dusk to dawn motion sensor and bringing 3 working modes. (Manual / Low / High)‚ë†Manual mode: just turn the wall-mounted switch “on-off-on” within 0.5~2 secondso shift to manual mode,keeping 100% brightness for 8 hours at night ,the dusk-to-dawn sensor detects morning and will automatically turn off. (Note: light switch in ON position, Sensing distance: 33FT, Sensing angle: 270¬∞),‚ë°Low Mode: Saving electricity for you, it won‚Äôt turn on at dusk and will be highly bright when motion is detected and off with no detection. ‚ë¢High Mode: These outdoor lights will turn on at 30% brightness at dusk and keep highly bright when motion is detected
„ÄêCLASSIC STYLE & MULTIPLE-SCENE„Äë: Vintage rustic design that adds sophistication to any outdoor decor, this outside lights the aluminum finish pairs perfectly with most outdoor occasions, such as patio,garages,balcony,front porches,doorways,gardens,hallways
„ÄêWEATHER RESISTANT & STURDY MATERIAL„Äë: White dusk to dawn motion sensor front porch lights , using rust-proof metal frame and thickened reinforced tempered water glass as a lampshade, lamp bezel coating waterproof golden quality aluminum, can waterproof, corrosion-resistant, anti-rust, can effectively resist heavy rain, snow, ice, high temperature and other weather, in these weather conditions, can be used for a longer period of time than the light fixtures on the market and don’t worry about the quality of the problem.
„ÄêRECOMMENDED BULB & E26 BASE„Äë: Our outdoor wall sconce does not include a bulb and uses a UL listed E26 base for long life, compatible with any kind of standard E26 LED bulb/incandescent bulb (Max 60W), the open design of the bottom of this fixture makes it easy for you to install the bulb or clean the fixture without disassembly, for a better experience, it is recommended to choose a dimmable incandescent or LED bulb, otherwise it will malfunction or flicker
„ÄêEASY INSTALLATION„Äë: The package of the porch light comes with installation instructions and mounting hardware, just finish the installation on the wall, remember to press the “Reset” or “Test” button between the GFCI sockets to reset the sockets and test the use, otherwise the light will probably not turn on, there will be no power output on the sockets, induction Sensitivity, sensing distance and lighting time are not adjustable, please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about this outdoor light.
„ÄêIMPORTANT NOTE„ÄëWhen the motion sensing is on for the first time (Enter Test Mode, it can also be sensed during the day in this mode), the light will be turned off after 5 seconds. When the motion sensing is on again after 2 minutes (Automatically Enter Normal Working Mode, it only can be sensed on the night in this mode), the light will be turned off after 2 minutes. After that, every time it is sensed, it is Normal Working Mode.If you are not familiar with electrical knowledge, please contact an electrician to install
